text:
[redacted_name]
Dear Parents,
I would like to inform you that students will have their first Literacy Quiz this Thursday. The quiz will cover the following:
(1) Vocabulary List (Week1) – Focus on meaning only.
(2) Write Right Vocabulary (Week1) – Focus on both meaning and spelling.
(3) Grammar – Types of sentences.
(4) Reading Comprehension.
The study materials required for the quiz are
trans:
[redacted_name]
Chers parents,
Je tiens à vous informer que les élèves auront leur premier quiz de littératie ce jeudi. Le quiz portera sur les points suivants :
(1) Liste de vocabulaire (Semaine 1) – Focalisé uniquement sur la signification.
(2) Vocabulaire "Write Right" (Semaine 1) – Focalisé à la fois sur la signification et l’orthographe.
(3) Grammaire – Types de phrases.
(4) Compréhension de lecture.
Les supports d'étude requis pour le quiz sont
